
variable        mcmoves equal f_montecarlo[1]
variable        mcaccratio equal f_montecarlo[2]/(f_montecarlo[1]+1e-10)

thermo_style	custom step temp etotal press c_p_all v_mcmoves v_mcaccratio

thermo	200

run		${prodlength}
run		10000
